START.name: A big house surrounded by graves
START.desc: You wake up in front of a huge house, surrounded by graves whhich make you fell a little weird

THE FRONT LOBBY.name: A big and old lobby
THE FRONT LOBBY.desc: A very large lobby with beautiful chandeliers on the ceiling and there are two stairs leading to the second floor

items.desc: A old photo on the floor of lobby
items.take: You pick up dusty photo and blow the dust on it

THE CEMETERY.name: A big and quite cemetery
THE CEMETERY.desc: A very big cemetery. You count it carefully, there are only six tombstones in this really big place

items.take: You pick a flower and put it in your pocket
